tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Dr. Chandrika for both issues regarding infertility and for regular pregnancy care as well. She is incredibly patient and answers all questions of anxious parents-to-be. What I found most helpful was her unassuming and approachable nature, that allowed us to share our concerns during infertility treatments without hesitation.  She was always reassuring- never once did she make us feel less hopeful while also being very practical. It is a refreshing change to be under the care of a doctor who does not over-prescribe tests or medicines while caring for your well-being.  I would strongly recommend Dr. Chandrika.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Since we were satisfied with treatment doctor had suggested, we would like to continue the treatment further with her. She is friendly and answers briefly to our queries. We would like to appreciate her politeness and friendliness towards us. After every consultation with the doctor we feel that we are filled with positive vibration which makes us feel that almost we have reached our destiny of having a baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our experience with Dr Chandrika Kulkarni has been very pleasant. She put my mother at ease right from the start and suggested a way of investigation that none of the other doctors did so far. She's friendly *** * **** ************** We would highly recommend her.

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Need to wait around 40 min for doctor to arrive. I feel doctor was not aware of the appointment via Practo which was told by the receptionist that day. On Practo, the consultation was shown as Rs 400 but as I opted for Cash, I was charged are 500. Don’t know why such discrepancy in the charges. Consultation wise doctor was not of big help as she referred us to a dermatologist for the hormone related hair fall which has started post delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First I would like to thank doctor chandrika. My first pregnancy ended with miscarriage and after 3 years, now I am pregnant. She is very friendly and polite and never hesitate to answer my queries. She identified the exact issue for my non conception and given proper iui treatment. *** ** *** **** ********* *********** Highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I came to see the doctor for infertility treatment, she does the ivf treatment within first time of treatment we got successfully ivf pregnancy with the doctor help. The doctor is very friendly she treated pregnancy problems very well, I recommend every one to kindly visit this doctor for Fertility and pregnancy treatment.
Thanks
Laxmi sanjeev

tags: None
review: *** ********* ** ********* ****** *** i would like to suggest for childless couples to approach for **** treatment and suggestions. Doctor is very friendly and answers all the queries. I'm very thankful to Dr. Chandrika for providing the **** treatment. And now i'm mother of two beautiful twin babies. I had ever seen like Dr.Chandrika , who understands problems (not only health wise but financially) and provides **** treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Chandrika is very good doctor.She does thorough analysis of the problem and gives you various options and helps you to decide the way forward.She is caring and I can vouch for her integrity.She will never do anything that is not as per Dr's dharma...Visit her for any of your gynaec issues and she will guide you.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ** *********** * ****** **** **** ****** ***** I couldn't undergo a scan as she prescribed due to lock down restrictions and went for a alternative scan (time lapsed for the first scan) suggested by other doctor in that time. When I resumed my monthly checkup with this gynaec, she commented everything is alright ******* **** ******** *** **** ******* She was not bothered to have a look on that report once even when I insisted to. Moreover I got vaccines done with the other doctor when I couldn't go to this gynaec for monthly checkup. She didn't even utter a word about vaccines. I wouldn't recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We first went to Dr. Chandrika when we were desperately trying for a child and after trying for nearly 5 years we were convinced that it was going to take at least a minimum of few IVF cycles to conceive. She patiently heard us out and counselled us before suggesting that we try naturally for a few cycles before going for IUI/IVF. In fact, it was on our insistence that we even went for the only IUI cycle that we did. Even during this one IUI cycle that we underwent, she took into consideration our inhibitions of taking hormone injections and modified the procedure accordingly. She treated our health issues with minimum medication. We conceived naturally after trying for just 2 months. She is a fantastic doctor, always available on-call to help us out with our queries. She spends a lot of time with her patients and resolves all their doubts and inhibitions. I would definitely recommend her to anyone who is trying for a baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hi

In this digital world i was under the impression that people are comfortable but your app made me disappointed. Doc was not available today and i had to travel 2 hrs to reach clinic. With so much of pain I was desperate to meet doc but in vain.

Moreover the hospital receptionist says that they aren't even aware of the appointment being booked. It's very disheartening. Pl don't hurt patients who are already suffering with pain.


Regards
